item.title: Forwards FR notice & press release re proposed addl safeguards for research reactors.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF NUCLEAR REACTOR REGULATION (NRR)

item.title: Reed College - Change of Facility Project Manager
item.author: NRC/NRR/DANU/UNPL

item.title: Generic ltr to all research & test reactor licensees re current status of revised guidance criteria for research & test reactor emergency planning.FR notice published 811231, amends dates & associated power levels for emergency plans.
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF NUCLEAR REACTOR REGULATION (NRR)

item.title: Advises that JM Pollock appointed acting director of Reed Reactor Facility,effective 900417.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION TO NRC, INCOMING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: Reed College

item.title: Advises that IE Info Notice 81-26, "Compilation of Health Physics Related Info Items," was distributed to listed licensees.
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION IV)

item.title: Advises that encl IE Info Notice 81-22, "Section 235 & 236 Amends to Atomic Energy Act of 1954," was sent to listed licensees on 810731.
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION IV)

item.title: Advises that IE Bulletin 81-02, "Failure of Gate Type Valves to Close Against Differential Pressure," was sent to listed licensees.
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION I)
